title: Reasons of a challenge sent to the universities of England, in matters of religion by Edmund Campion ; faithfully translated into English.
author: Campion, Edmund, Saint, 1540-1581.
notes: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Translated from: Les Dix raisons proposées aux academies d'Angleterre sur les matières de la foy, par le P. Edmond Campian. cf. BM.
